prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: Awesome Prompt Engineering
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Comprehensive, hand-curated list of prompt engineering resources, tools, and papers focused on GPT, ChatGPT, PaLM, and more.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: Prompt Engineering Repository
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Popular all-in-one educational repo with tutorials, code, and hands-on guides for all levels; nearly 4,000 stars.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: Prompt Engineering Laboratory
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Repository with code, reference implementations, and demo notebooks for prompt engineering with LLMs, including exploration guides.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: Awesome LLM JSON
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Curated list focused on using LLMs for structured outputs (JSON, XML, YAML), including function calling and guided generation.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: Prompt Engineering Datasets
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Central hub for downloadable prompt datasets: ChatGPT, DiffusionDB, Midjourney, P3, PartiPrompts, and more.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: LangChain
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Modular framework for building complex prompt workflows with memory and reusable templates; steep learning curve.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: OpenPrompt
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Advanced prompt engineering framework with dynamic templates, evaluation metrics, and multi-model support.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: PromptLayer
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Enterprise-grade tool for prompt version control, analytics, and monitoring across multiple LLMs.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: Agenta
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Tool for prompt versioning, side-by-side LLM comparisons, and fast development cycles.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: PromptAppGPT
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Low-code platform for rapid prototyping and team collaboration on prompt design.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: Prompt Engine
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Focuses on reducing bias and improving prompt precision with real-time feedback and analytics.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: Latitude
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Collaboration-focused tool for building production-ready LLM solutions.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: Microsoft Copilot Prompts
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Official Microsoft repo with prompt examples for Copilot across Word, PowerPoint, Teams, and more.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: Awesome ChatGPT Prompts
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Large, community-driven collection of effective ChatGPT prompts for various tasks.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: Midjourney Prompts
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Dataset of prompts for image generation with Midjourney, useful for creative prompt engineering.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: P3 - Public Pool of Prompts
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Open pool of prompts for benchmarking and experimentation.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: Real Toxicity Prompts
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Dataset for evaluating prompt safety and toxicity in LLM outputs.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: Stable Diffusion Dataset
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Extensive dataset of prompts for Stable Diffusion image generation models.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: PartiPrompts
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Dataset designed for evaluating and developing prompt strategies for Parti models.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: WritingPrompts
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Large set of creative writing prompts for LLM fine-tuning and testing.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: Krista AI Guide
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Review and comparison of prompt engineering guides from OpenAI, Microsoft, and Google, plus Krista’s automated approach.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: OpenAI Prompt Engineering Guide
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Official best practices and recipes for prompt design and iteration (referenced in multiple guides).

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: Google Gemini Prompting Guide
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Google’s structured guide for prompt design, emphasizing iterative refinement and role/task specificity.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: Prompt Engineering Tutorials (Prompt Engineering Repository)
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: In-depth tutorials on techniques like zero-shot, few-shot, chain-of-thought, and role prompting.

prompt_engineering_resources_2025.name: Prompt Zoo (Prompt Engineering Laboratory)
prompt_engineering_resources_2025.description: Collection of experiments and pre-built environments for hands-on prompt engineering.
